alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Carter; Greenup (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Gusty showers will impact portions of Boyd, southeastern Greenup, southeastern Carter, southwestern Lawrence, west central Cabell and northwestern Wayne Counties through 1230 PM EST... At 1159 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers near Naples, or 7 miles west of Cannonsburg, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Huntington, Ashland, Ironton, Grayson, Coal Grove, Chesapeake, Cannonsburg, Kenova, Catlettsburg, Ceredo, Princess, Coalton, Denton, Oldtown, Naples, Rush, Flatwoods, South Point, Russell and Raceland. This includes the following highways... Interstate 64 in Kentucky between mile markers 167 and 191. Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 1 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
